definitions: The process of translating words or text from one language into another.
A written or spoken rendering of the meaning of a word, text, or work in another language.
The process of moving something from one place to another.
The process by which a sequence of nucleotide triplets in a messenger RNA molecule gives rise to a specific sequence of amino acids during synthesis of a polypeptide chain.
examples: The translation of the novel took a year.
The translation of the gene was successful.
We observed the translation of the object across the plane.
